ack.p: The authors extend their appreciation to The Researchers Supporting Project number (RSP-2020/122) King Saud University, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. We are also grateful to Dr. Nasrullah, Department of Botany, University of Malakand, Pakistan for the identification of plants. UR has purchased an MOE license under HEC NRPU-project (5291/Federal/NRPU/R&D/HEC/2016). MZ is thankful to the Higher Education Commission of Pakistan for providing funding for the HPLC under project number HEC-NRPU-20-2515. AS is thankful to the Higher Education Commission of Pakistan for providing funding for consumables under the project number 10562/KPK/NRPU/R&D/2017.
